redFlags.description: Uncontrolled chronic condition (high A1C, high sugars, high BP)
Appointment adherence (missed appts/unable to schedule appts)
Resource utilization (trips to ER, requesting unnecessary tests/procedures)
Medication adherence (missed/not taking meds, unable to order meds)
Plan of care (POC) Adherence (not following previous plan of care/recommendations)
Knowledge of health or health care status (unaware of diagnosis, test results)
Medical equipment/supplies adherence (not using med. equip. as directed)
